name: Software collateral
description:
Software as collateral is an Immaterial rights as collateral that is a legal concept that recognizes software as a form of intellectual creation that does not need a physical form, but grants the owner or creator exclusive rights to use, modify, distribute, or license it, subject to the intellectual property law.

See also IAS 38 for its usage as Property, Plant & Equipment or Other intangible non-financial assets.
